name: Gangster Legend
description:
"Gangster Legend", an underworld crime RPG masterpiece, a game of guns, domination, power, money and organized crime. As the main protagonist, you will set off on a grand journey to revenge for the death of your father and install yourself as the godfather of the leading mafia family in this criminals’ heaven, the vice city. Dive into criminals’ world: assassinate your enemies on streets, make money via casino, secure your position as godfather, rule with your iron fist and train your future successor. The future of a mafia kingdom lies in every decision you make.

Game Features:
1. Capo System
Hundreds of unique capos will risk their lives to help you complete revenge and become the godfather of the underworld

2. Beauty System
Dozens of different styles of beauties are available for you to choose, making you linger in the tender land

3. Smuggling System
Gangsters also have a knack of making money. While travelling all over the world and making deals with gang forces worldwide, attractive rewards await your participation

4. Patrolling System
While patrolling, you will find various beauties, get acquainted with sworn brothers, trigger mysterious events and get a variety of rewards

5. Hall of Fame System
Popularity PK in the Hall of Fame, record your exclusive glory moments

6. Alliance System
Join the Alliance members to build the strongest alliance and challenge the mysterious Alliance Instance

7. Feast System
A relaxing and leisurely feast, which enables you to be intoxicated with luxury

8. Instance System
The rise of a once decadent man, from taking over the crumbling family to becoming a godfather, until reaching the pinnacle of power
